text: @realDonaldTrump This is a great idea! The ballots are undoubtedly pre-marked (Democrat, of course) so all you have to do is sign it...or them...depending on how many you receive...and drop them in the mail. No worries about coronavirus exposure, so you're safe for your next protest/riot.
